name: specswarm
description: Complete software development toolkit: spec-driven workflows, autonomous orchestration, lifecycle management (bugfix/modify/refactor), quality validation, and performance monitoring. v3.4.0: Confidence-based auto-execution (build/fix/upgrade) + expanded trigger keywords ('not showing up') + enhanced ship safety confirmation + semantic understanding. v3.3.9: MANDATORY/ALWAYS directive descriptions. v3.3.8: Directory name matching.
